title: President Alvi advises Afghan brothers to be aware of spoilers like India
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 20 (APP):President Dr Arif Ali, while describing the 40 years of Afghan conflict as a “story of total devastation” on Tuesday advised the brotherly nation to be aware of spoilers like India, which did not want peace.
“40 yrs of Afghan conflict is story of total devastation. Our brothers should be aware of spoilers like India who don’t want peace to keep on using Afghan territory to try & destabilize us,” President Alvi said in a tweet.
40 yrs of Afghan conflict is story of total devastation. Our brothers shud be aware of spoilers like India who don't want peace to keep on using Afghan territory to try & destabilise us.  Afghans shud do a ceasefire & arrive at peace ASAP. We are natural friends & will remain so. https://t.co/HMVJV1Hq8u
— Dr. Arif Alvi (@ArifAlvi) October 20, 2020
He further said that the Afghans should observe a ceasefire and arrive at peace as soon as possible. Pakistan and Afghanistan were natural friends and would remain so, he added.
